segments.text: I notice the water spilling everywhere, and it’s making me really angry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, completely ignoring the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not see the water pouring onto the floor?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already wet, and she doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s being incredibly irresponsible right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are going to slip and fall if she doesn’t do something soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is already on a wobbly stool, and now the floor is wet too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like yelling at her to turn off the faucet and pay attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But she’s so calm, like nothing is happening at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s even aware of the kids behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just infuriating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
